mapper.select: select REV_NUM, NAME, REV_WRITE_DATE, REV_TITLE, REV_CONT from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY r.REV_WRITE_DATE DESC) as rnum, r.REV_NUM, m.NAME, r.REV_WRITE_DATE, r.REV_TITLE, r.REV_CONT from REVIEW r, MEMBER m where m.id=r.id and r.PRD_NUM=#{prdNum} and r.BEST_FLAG=1 ORDER BY r.REV_WRITE_DATE DESC ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
select rai.rev_img from REVIEW_ADD_IMG rai, REVIEW r where r.rev_num=rai.rev_num and rai.rev_num=#{revNum}
select r.REV_NUM, m.NAME, r.REV_WRITE_DATE, r.REV_TITLE, r.REV_CONT, r.REV_HITS from REVIEW r, MEMBER m where m.id=r.id(+) and r.REV_NUM=#{revNum}
select nvl(max(od.ORDER_NUM), 0) as ORDER_NUM from ORDER_DETAIL od, PRODUCT_ORDER po where od.ORDER_NUM=po.ORDER_NUM AND po.id=#{id} AND od.PRD_NUM=#{prdNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(REV_NUM, ID, ORDER_NUM, PRD_NUM, REV_TITLE, REV_CONT) VALUES(#{revNum}, #{id}, #{orderNum}, #{prdNum}, #{revTitle}, #{revCont})
